snippet: Coughlin said Pierre-Paul, whose right index finger was amputated, did not indicate when he planned to rejoin the team, but it did not sound as if it would be soon.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants coach Tom Coughlin reports phone conversation with defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul, who has not been to team's training camp since undergoing serious fireworks injury in July; says call was pleasant but that Pierre-Paul continues to avoid discussing details of his injury or any plans to rejoin team; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Coughlin said Pierre-Paul, whose right index finger was amputated, did not indicate when he planned to rejoin the team, but it did not sound as if it would be soon.

headline.print_headline: Pierre-Paul Reveals Little in Phone Call
headline.main: Tom Coughlin Finds Little New in a Talk With Jason Pierre-Paul
